page.title: 17Work-Brenchley/Matfield.
page.content:
We surveyed{43}families in the area, altogether{78}people worked,{23}were partime. {Where people worked. Transport used.} Village _ 47% Car _ 63% Town _ 23% Other _ 22% City _ 17% Train _ 10% Other _ 13% Lift _ 4% Bus _ 1%
On average people worked{8 hours}a day,those running their{own business} tended to work{longer hours.} We found that people do not change their jobs very often:in the last 5 years{18%}changed once and{3%}had changed 2-5 times. About{one fifth}felt there could be a danger of{redundancy.} We were happy to discover that most people liked their jobs,finding them {satisfying}or{very fulfilling.}
